attrUUID(address,uint256).details: Generates an identifier which associates a user and a poll together

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

attrUUID(address,uint256).return: UUID Hash which is deterministic from _user and _pollID

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

commitPeriodActive(uint256).return: Boolean indication of isCommitPeriodActive for target poll

params._numTokens: The number of tokens to be committed towards the target poll
params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._prevPollID: The ID of the poll that the user has voted the maximum number of tokens in which is still less than or equal to numTokens
params._secretHash: Commit keccak256 hash of voter's choice and salt (tightly packed in this order)

params._numsTokens: Array of numbers of tokens to be committed towards the target polls
params._pollIDs: Array of integer identifiers associated with target polls

params._secretHashes: Array of commit keccak256 hashes of voter's choices and salts (tightly packed in this order)

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll

rescueTokens(uint256).details: Unlocks tokens locked in unrevealed vote where poll has ended

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with the target poll

rescueTokensInMultiplePolls(uint256[]).details: Unlocks tokens locked in unrevealed votes where polls have ended

params._pollIDs: Array of integer identifiers associated with the target polls

revealPeriodActive(uint256).details: Checks isExpired for the specified poll's revealEndDate

params._pollID: Integer identifier associated with target poll
Integer identifier associated with target poll
params._salt: Secret number used to generate commitHash for associated poll
params._voteOption: Vote choice used to generate commitHash for associated poll

params._pollIDs: Array of integer identifiers associated with target polls
params._salts: Array of secret numbers used to generate commitHashes for associated polls
params._voteOptions: Array of vote choices used to generate commitHashes for associated polls

startPoll(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Initiates a poll with canonical configured parameters at pollID emitted by PollCreated event

params._commitDuration: Length of desired commit period in seconds
params._revealDuration: Length of desired reveal period in seconds
params._voteQuorum: Type of majority (out of 100) that is necessary for poll to be successful

validPosition(uint256,uint256,address,ui.details: Compares previous and next poll's committed tokens for sorting purposes

params._nextID: Integer identifier associated with next poll in sorted order
params._numTokens: The number of tokens to be committed towards the poll (used for sorting)
params._prevID: Integer identifier associated with previous poll in sorted order
params._voter: Address of user to check DLL position for

validPosition(uint256,uint256,address,ui.return: valid Boolean indication of if the specified position maintains the sort

params._numTokens: The number of ERC20 tokens desired in exchange for voting rights

devdoc.title: Partial-Lock-Commit-Reveal Voting scheme with ERC20 tokens

commitPeriodActive(uint256).notice: Checks if the commit period is still active for the specified poll

commitVote(uint256,bytes32,uint256,uint2.notice: Commits vote using hash of choice and secret salt to conceal vote until reveal

commitVotes(uint256[],bytes32[],uint256[.notice: Commits votes using hashes of choices and secret salts to conceal votes until reveal

requestVotingRights(uint256).notice: Loads _numTokens ERC20 tokens into the voting contract for one-to-one voting rights

revealPeriodActive(uint256).notice: Checks if the reveal period is still active for the specified poll

revealVote(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Reveals vote with choice and secret salt used in generating commitHash to attribute committed tokens

revealVotes(uint256[],uint256[],uint256[.notice: Reveals multiple votes with choices and secret salts used in generating commitHashes to attribute committed tokens

withdrawVotingRights(uint256).notice: Withdraw _numTokens ERC20 tokens from the voting contract, revoking these voting rights
